summary:
Pinterest is a popular social media platform that lets users share and discover ideas through images. It's like a virtual bulletin board where people can save and organize pictures, known as "pins," onto different themed boards. These pins can be anything from delicious recipes to fashion inspiration, home decor ideas, and motivational quotes. 

The company was started by Ben Silbermann and his team, who wanted to create a place where people could explore and save their favorite things they find online. Pinterest is based in San Francisco and has become a go-to site for visual inspiration.
title: Pinterest
